title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.144 - Qualifying metallic components
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.144 - Qualifying metallic components

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any requirement of this Part which
incorporates by reference an edition of a document listed in section
10.3
or Appendix 14-B of this

Title, a metallic component manufactured in accordance with any other edition
of that document is qualified for use under this Part if: (a) it can be shown through visual inspection
of the cleaned component that no defect which might impair the strength or
tightness of the component exists; and
(b) the edition of the document under which
the component was manufactured has equal or more stringent requirements than an
edition of that document currently or previously incorporated by reference (as
described in section
10.3
or Appendix 14-B of this

Title) for pressure testing, materials, and pressure and temperature
ratings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.144

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
